sub_topic: Prove that the empty set is a subset of every set.
message_1: Let A = {2, 4, 6, 8} and B = {}. Determine whether the empty set is a subset of set A and set B.
message_2:
The empty set, denoted as âˆ… or {}, is a subset of every set, including itself. This is because there are no elements in the empty set that are not also in any other set.

So, the empty set is a subset of set A = {2, 4, 6, 8} and set B = {}.
